item.title: Making Remote Work Work
item.description: Fully remote work is here to stay, even if it does not become as ubiquitous as it was in 2022. While there are many companies out there that have fully returned all their employees back to the office for fully in-person work, there will always be a market of employee and employees that will prefer to reach a working agreement that is location agnostic. This might not be possible to achieve for all companies across all industries, but I firmly believe that remote work is ultimately better than in-person work for most companies that mainly perform business over the internet.
